gcci.text: The H100 pricing at $3.16/hr reflects improving chip supply chain dynamics and increased manufacturing capacity, though sustained capex remains critical to prevent future scarcity.

gtpi.text: DeepSeek's $1.25/1M token pricing signals an aggressive API price war that pressures margins while driving model efficiency improvements through competitive pressure.

gagl.text: AI infrastructure's 120 TWh annual energy load represents significant grid strain that necessitates accelerated nuclear adoption and renewable integration to maintain carbon neutrality.

aipi.text: Rapid AI adoption shows healthy momentum but faces sustainability headwinds from energy intensity, creating bubble risks if infrastructure can't scale responsibly.
